name: Pokemon Xenoverse: Per Aspera Ad Astra
name_original: Pokemon Xenoverse: Per Aspera Ad Astra
description:
Available in English and Italian.

"The search for a father who disappeared into thin air is intertwined with a much more complex matter: interdimensional faults have begun to become more and more frequent in the Eldiw region, now invaded by the terrible Species X ... The Xenoverse Eclipse is now upon us and the Team Dimension seems to have something to do with it! Will you be able to stop its sinister plots and maintain the balance between the Earth and Xenoverse, whose indissoluble bond has its roots in the past?"

A completely new graphic enhancement.

A new Pokémon type: the Sound-type.

The mysterious X Species coming from another dimension!

No more obsolete HMs with the new PokéWES, aka the Wide Exploration System!

Porygon Center, a portable Pokémon Center! Just $500 and you'll be able to heal your Pokémon or use the Storage System even in the harsher dungeons!

A lot of new Pokémon.

New special Pokémon besides the Shiny Pokémon: the Vintage Pokémon!

This and much more! Discover everything Xenoverse: Per Aspera Ad Astra has to offer!
